alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 25 at 3:21AM HST until January 25 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR MAUNA KEA AND MAUNA LOA SUMMITS REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THURSDAY... .Westerly winds over the summits and upper slopes of the Big Island will remain dangerously strong through today. ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 60 mph with localized gusts over 75 mph. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
